title: Can we atleast start the rotating game modes?
body: Clearly everyone is disappointed URF isn't on its birthday, but it is coming. However, the Draven joke was funny for about 3 seconds until I realized its back to same old league on April 1st. Also I want to play gamemodes. Lets start it this weekend.

replies.body:
It can't start yet. They've only tested Poro King on the PBE so far - they're doing Ascension, but it's not done yet (Illaoi's passive isn't working for example). They'll have to test a lot more gamemodes (URF for one) before the queue can start.

I expect it'll be a few months yet unfortunately.
Yeah, if we have it now, it will be just like Draven Day, poorly done and looking unfinished.
but still, this was going to be my first URF(i joined august last year).
As much as i don't really mind it. Im really happy to see that you aren't super angry frustrated at Riot, So thx for that {{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}
Uh, if it was done, it would be in operation already. It's not, and whining won't do anything about that.
No one is whining here. We are just asking if the rotating mode can start

> [{quoted}](name=VeniVidiVelcro,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=KAdEhp9O,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2016-04-01T16:55:50.609+0000)
>
> Uh, if it was done, it would be in operation already. It's not, and whining won't do anything about that.

To be fair if they had worked on URF instead of Poro King (:S) and Ascension ( :D ) it would  have been fine :P
Yeah, Riot! Who cares if it's ready or not, or if there are bugs or not: We need something right now!
